title: Oaklawn Academy
text:
Oaklawn Academy is a <a href="boarding%20school">boarding school</a>. It was founded by the <a href="Legion%20of%20Christ">Legion of Christ</a>.
Originally situated in <a href="Cheshire%2C%20Connecticut">Cheshire, Connecticut</a>, the academy moved, in 1986, to <a href="Edgerton%2C%20Wisconsin">Edgerton, Wisconsin</a>, in a rural area on the shore of <a href="Lake%20Koshkonong">Lake Koshkonong</a>, 25 miles from <a href="Madison%2C%20Wisconsin">Madison, Wisconsin</a>, and approximately two hours north of <a href="Chicago">Chicago</a>.
The campus is located just off <a href="Interstate%2090">Interstate 90</a>.
